channel.title: Fishing Problem?
channel.description:
Well, I've added the object(Which is the fishing spot)((Object ID = 1749))
And When I fish I need manta Rays to come and say You've Caught A Manta Ray and for Sea Turtles to come out and say you've Caught a Sea turtle!
And The Requirement to Fish from this spot is 90. Anyone got the Case for this? Check your files if you have a server Because my source is a bit clean lol.

item.title: Fishing Problem?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

                     [code]  if ((objectID == 1749)){
			sM("You catch a " + getItemName(id));
			addItem(389, 1);
			addSkillXP(10000, 10);
		} else {
			sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
			resetAction(true);
		}[/code]

Try something like this, but modify the code to add Timers/Fishing Level requirements, I tried this from the top of my head, so the chances are it wont work, but worth a try.

If you’re using Silab, replace ‘sM’ with ‘sendMessage’

The case would be

Case 1749 // Fishing spot sM("You catch a " + getItemName(id)); addItem(389, 1); addSkillXP(10000, 10); } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); resetAction(true); }

Or something like that.

Read full topic
